Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._stakeUnderlying: Array of booleans indicating whether to stake underlying tokens
params._tokenAddress: Array of token addresses to lock
params._tokenAmount: Array of token amounts to lock

returns._0: The ID of the newly created veNFT

params._stakeUnderlying: Array of booleans indicating whether to stake underlying tokens
params._to: Address to assign the lock to
params._tokenAddress: Array of token addresses to lock
params._tokenAmount: Array of token amounts to lock

returns._0: The ID of the newly created veNFT

params.amount: The amount of voting power to delegate.
params.fromTokenId: The ID of the veNFT from which voting power is delegated.
params.lpToken: The address of the LP token associated with the delegation.
params.toTokenId: The ID of the veNFT to which voting power is delegated.

params._stakeUnderlying: Whether to stake the underlying tokens
params._tokenAddress: Address of the token to increase lock amount for
params._tokenAmount: Amount of tokens to add to the lock

params._lockDuration: New lock duration to extend to

initialize(address).details: This function is called only once during the contract deployment. It initializes the Ownable, ERC721, and ReentrancyGuard modules.

params._ap: The AddressesProvider contract used for address management.

params._stakeUnderlying: Whether to stake the underlying tokens
params._tokenAddress: Address of the new token to lock
The address of the token to lock.
params._tokenId: The ID of the token to lock.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

params.amounts: Array of amounts of voting power to remove from each delegatee
params.fromTokenId: ID of the veNFT from which delegatees are removed
params.lpToken: Address of the LP token associated with the delegation
params.toTokenIds: Array of veNFT IDs that are delegatees to be removed

params.amounts: Array of amounts of voting power to remove from each delegator
params.fromTokenIds: Array of veNFT IDs that are delegators to be removed
params.lpToken: Address of the LP token associated with the delegation
params.toTokenId: ID of the veNFT from which delegators are removed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setExtensions(address,address).details: This function can only be called by authorized entities.

params._veIONFirstExtension: The address of the first extension contract.
params._veIONSecondExtension: The address of the second extension contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

params._tokenAddress: The address of the token to unlock.
params._tokenId: The ID of the token to unlock.

PRECISION().notice: Precision used for calculations, set to 1e18.

ap().notice: The AddressesProvider contract used for address management.

createLock(address[],uint256[],uint256[].notice: Creates a new lock for multiple tokens

createLockFor(address[],uint256[],uint25.notice: Creates a new lock for multiple tokens and assigns it to a specified address

delegate(uint256,uint256,address,uint256.notice: Delegates voting power from one veNFT to another.

increaseAmount(address,uint256,uint256,b.notice: Increases the amount of tokens locked for a specific veNFT

increaseUnlockTime(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Increases the lock duration for a specific token in a veNFT

initialize(address).notice: Initializes the veION contract with the given AddressesProvider.

lockAdditionalAsset(address,uint256,uint.notice: Locks additional asset type for an existing veNFT

removeDelegatees(uint256,uint256[],addre.notice: Removes delegatees from a specific veNFT

removeDelegators(uint256[],uint256,addre.notice: Removes delegators from a specific veNFT

s_limitedBoost().notice: The amount of limited boost available.

s_limitedBoostActive().notice: Indicates whether the limited boost is active.

s_maxEarlyWithdrawFee().notice: The maximum fee for early withdrawal.

setExtensions(address,address).notice: Sets the implementation addresses for the veION contract extensions.

veIONFirstExtension().notice: The address of the logic contract for the veION first extension.

veIONSecondExtension().notice: The address of the logic contract for the veION second extension.

voting(uint256,bool).notice: Updates voting status for a veNFT

userdoc.notice: This contract manages the veION framework, enabling the staking and management LP tokens for voting power.
